name: Blastwave (Selectricity Productions, ItzTheXenon, CrazySheep05, Evelynisbae)
description:
It's June 2020, you're living in your perfect house, in your perfect neighbourhood when you start listening to an amusing radio episode about nuclear weapons. Nothing could be better than just listening to that program...

A game made for Weekly Game Jam 152.

Programming:
- Tarik
- Crazy Sheep
- Remi

Composing and sound effects:
- Evelyn

3D Art:
- Crazy Sheep

Team Bornwave.
